cs.ualberta.ca.tunein

Class Comment

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs.ualberta.ca.tunein.Comment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class Comment
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Model Comment Class: This is class is part of the comment model. Its major function is the attributes of a comment. The most important attributes of a comment is the title, the comment text, replies, geo location, and image. This references commenter, geo location and image classes. This class is used in the comment controller.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Constructors

      Comment(Commenter user, String aTitle, String aComment, GeoLocation loc, String parent)
      This constructor constructs a comment without an image.

        public Comment(Commenter user,
       String aTitle,
       String aComment,
       GeoLocation loc,
       Image aImage,
       String parent)
        This constructor constructs a comment with an image.
        Parameters:
        user - The user that comment belongs to.
        aTitle - The title of the comment.
        aComment - The comment body.
        loc - The geo location of comment.
        aImage - The image of comment.
